mapper.select: select a.genie_id, a.genie_pwd, u.user_name, a.ROLE from user u join account a on a.genie_id=u.genie_id where a.genie_id=#{genie_id} and a.withdrawal=1;
mapper.insert: insert into account(ROLE, genie_id, genie_pwd) values(#{ROLE},#{genie_id}, #{genie_pwd})
insert into user(genie_id, user_name, user_tel, user_email, user_gender) values(#{genie_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_tel}, #{user_email}, #{user_gender})

insert into address(address_num, genie_id, receiver_name, receiver_tel, receiver_zipcode, receiver_addr, receiver_detailaddr) values(#{address_num}, #{genie_id},#{user_name}, #{user_tel}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_detailaddr})
mapper.select: select * from product_like l join product d on l.product_id=d.product_id where l.genie_id=#{param1} order by product_like desc
